title: Acupuncture
description: Trusted Doctor of Acupuncture and Chinese Medicine providing a variety of services to Coon Rapids, MN. Contact us by phone at 651-964-3868 or visit us at 3818 Coon Rapids Blvd, Coon Rapids, MN 55433 | Minnesota Integrative Medicine & Acupuncture
cleaned_text: Acupuncture is a time-tested, holistic medicine that can help decrease pain and restore function. It is also helpful for internal conditions such as anxiety, GI problems, fertility, thyroid disorders, allergies, and much more. Our doctors have extensively trained with world-renowned physicians bridging functional medicine and traditional techniques. The biological mechanism of acupuncture is rooted in Neuroscience. An initial consultation with Dr. Beaman is required to evaluate your case and determine if you are a good candidate for acupuncture. If you are determined to be a candidate, we can perform your first procedure on the same day.
